title: The mastery emote bugged?
body: I don't know if it's bugged or not but it won't activate in game

replies.body:
Hey there,

This is currently a [known issue](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/lFOdTP88-cant-use-mastery-emote-ctrl5-ingame?comment=0004) and is affecting all regions running patch 6.9.

Riot is working on the issue and a fix should be released soon enough.
